resources.string: Add an email account to start using Gfmail
Add an email account to get started
NetEase email requires password to send emails
Note: NetEase email requires SMTP service to be enabled and correct password.

Connection timeout. Possible causes:
1. Network connection issues
2. NetEase email SMTP service not enabled
3. Please check network settings and firewall

Authentication failed. NetEase email requires:
1. Enable SMTP service
2. Use correct email password
3. Check email security settings
Share this QR code to set up account on another device
Delete this folder and all its emails?
Connection timeout. Please check your network connection and try again.
Authentication failed. Please check your email and password.
NetEase email connection failed. Please check the following settings:
QQ email connection failed. Please check the following settings:
Gmail connection failed. Please check your app password.
Exchange/Outlook connection failed. Please check your credentials.
Password is too weak. Please use a more secure password.
Password length must be at least %d characters.
Invalid password format. Please check the requirements.
Choose the account to use for sending emails:
Select your email service provider to get started
Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must be at least 6 characters
Password must be at least 6 characters
Password must be at least 8 characters

NetEase email connection failed. Please check the following settings:

üîê NetEase email authentication:
1. Use NetEase email login password:
 - Use your NetEase email login password directly
 - Ensure the password is correct

2. Use authorization code (recommended):
 - Login to NetEase email web version
 - Settings ‚Üí POP3/SMTP/IMAP ‚Üí Enable IMAP/SMTP service
 - Generate authorization code and use it as password

3. Server configuration:
 - IMAP server: imap.163.com:993 (SSL)
 - SMTP server: smtp.163.com:465 (SSL)

üí° If login password fails, try using authorization code

QQ email connection failed. Please check the following settings:

üîê QQ email authentication:
1. Use QQ email login password:
 - Use your QQ email login password directly
 - Ensure the password is correct

2. Use authorization code (recommended):
 - Login to QQ email web version
 - Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Enable IMAP/SMTP service
 - Generate authorization code and use it as password

3. Server configuration:
 - IMAP server: imap.qq.com:993 (SSL)
 - SMTP server: smtp.qq.com:587 (STARTTLS)

üí° If login password fails, try using authorization code

Gmail connection failed. Please check the following settings:

üîê Gmail authentication:
1. Visit myaccount.google.com/apppasswords
2. Generate new App Password
3. Use App Password instead of regular password
Exchange/Outlook connection failed. Please check your credentials and server settings.

QQ email connection failed. Please check the following settings:

üîê QQ email authentication:
1. Use QQ email login password:
 - Use your QQ email login password directly
 - Ensure the password is correct

2. Use authorization code (recommended):
 - Login to QQ email web version
 - Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Enable IMAP/SMTP service
 - Generate authorization code and use it as password

3. Server configuration:
 - IMAP server: imap.qq.com:993 (SSL)
 - SMTP server: smtp.qq.com:587 (STARTTLS)

4. Network connection:
 - Ensure network connection is normal
 - Avoid frequent login

üí° If login password fails, try using authorization code

NetEase email connection failed. Please check the following settings:

üîê NetEase email authentication:
1. Use NetEase email login password:
 - Use your NetEase email login password directly
 - Ensure the password is correct

2. Use authorization code (recommended):
 - Login to NetEase email web version
 - Settings ‚Üí POP3/SMTP/IMAP ‚Üí Enable IMAP/SMTP service
 - Generate authorization code and use it as password

3. Server configuration:
 - IMAP server: imap.163.com:993 (SSL)
 - SMTP server: smtp.163.com:465 (SSL)

4. Security settings:
 - Ensure third-party client login is allowed
 - Check account security status

üí° If login password fails, try using authorization code
Password length must be at least %d characters
POP3 password length must be at least %d characters
IMAP server connection failed. Please check email address and password
POP3 server connection failed. Please check email address and password

Connection timeout. Possible causes:
1. Network connection issue
2. Need to use Gmail App Password
3. Please check network settings and firewall

Connection timeout. Possible causes:
1. Network connection issue
2. QQ email SMTP service not enabled
3. Please check network settings and firewall

Connection timeout. Possible causes:
1. Network connection issue
2. SMTP service not enabled
3. Please check network settings and firewall

Authentication failed. Gmail requires App Password:
1. Visit myaccount.google.com/apppasswords
2. Generate new App Password
3. Use App Password instead of regular password

QQ email authentication failed!

Please follow these steps:
1. Login to QQ email web version
2. Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Enable SMTP service
3. Get authorization code (not QQ password)
4. Re-enter authorization code in the app

Click OK to re-enter password

Authentication failed. Please check:
1. Whether email password is correct
2. Whether SMTP service is enabled
3. Email security settings

Connection failed: %s

Please check:
1. Network connection
2. %s SMTP settings
3. Account security settings

Gmail requires an App Password for third-party applications.

Steps to generate App Password:
1. Go to myaccount.google.com/apppasswords
2. Generate a new App Password
3. Enter your details below:

QQ email requires password to send emails.

Please ensure:
1. QQ email SMTP service is enabled
2. Use correct QQ email password
3. Enter the following information:

Outlook requires password to send emails.

Please ensure:
1. Outlook SMTP service is enabled
2. Use correct email password
3. Enter the following information:

Email requires password to send emails.

Please ensure:
1. Email SMTP service is enabled
2. Use correct email password
3. Enter the following information:
Select your email service provider to get started

NetEase email security policy restriction

Please follow these steps:
1. Login to 163/126/188 email web version
2. Go to Settings ‚Üí POP3/SMTP/IMAP
3. Enable client authorization code feature
4. Use generated 16-digit authorization code as password
5. Ensure using port 993+SSL connection

NetEase email folder access restriction

This folder is restricted by NetEase email security policy:
‚Ä¢ Drafts, Sent folders may require special permissions
‚Ä¢ This is NetEase email security policy, doesn't affect inbox sync
‚Ä¢ For full functionality, contact NetEase customer service: kefu@188.com

Authentication failed

Please check:
1. Whether using client authorization code (not login password)
2. Whether client authorization code is valid
3. Whether IMAP/SMTP service is enabled
4. Whether using correct connection settings (port 993+SSL)

Connection timeout

Possible reasons:
1. Network connection issue
2. Need to use client authorization code
3. Please check network settings and firewall
Connection failed: %s\n\nPlease check network connection and account settings
